title: The Great Trophy Quest
story: The village is in disarray; the prized Chicken Cup Trophy has gone missing on the eve of the Great Fowl Fair! As the local detective, you've been summoned to uncover this peculiar poultry predicament.

root.prompt: Where will you start your investigation?

options.title: The Royal Chicken Coop
options.story: The chickens cluck and strut around, one of them shares, 'Did you hear about the grain prices? Simply clucking-tastic!'

options.title: The Blacksmith's Forge
options.story: The Blacksmith, with feathers in his beard, chuckles, 'Looking for the trophy? I can't help with that, but how about this shiny spoon? Almost the same thing, right?'

options.title: The Mysterious Forest
options.story: As you venture deep into the forest, you stumble upon a shiny rock. 'Hmm, not quite the trophy, but shiny nonetheless!' you think.

royal-chicken-coop.prompt: Inside the Royal Chicken Coop, you are surrounded by an array of aristocratic hens and roosters. What will you do?

options.title: Interview the Rooster-in-Chief
options.story: Rooster-in-Chief ruffles his feathers and proclaims, 'A trophy? My comb itches more than this concerns me. But check the hay loft; strange cluckings have been heard from up there.'

options.title: Search the Nesting Boxes
options.story: You sift through feathers and eggs. A hen squawks, 'Careful, dear, those are this morning's batch!' Beneath a particularly plump hen, you find a trail of suspiciously shiny feathers.

options.title: Inspect the Grain Storage
options.story: The grain silo is quieter than the coop. As you dig through the grain, you uncover a trail of footprints leading outside. 'Curious,' you muse, 'Very curious indeed!'

hay-loft.prompt: The hay loft is dim and dusty. A faint glint catches your eye from a corner.

options.title: Investigate the Shiny Object
options.story: Pushing aside bales of hay reveals a golden gleam. It's a gilded egg! 'Interesting,' you ponder, 'but not the trophy I'm after.'

options.title: Listen for Cluckings
options.story: You hold still, and the cluckings lead you to a secret hatch. With a creak, it swings open to reveal a ladder descending into darkness.

nesting-boxes.prompt: You carefully check the nesting boxes.

options.title: Lift the plump hen
options.story: The hen clucks indignantly but under her, you find a key with a feather emblem. 'This must be important,' you think.

grain-storage.prompt: The trail of footprints in the grain storage piques your interest.

options.title: Follow the footprints
options.story: The footprints lead to a small, feather-covered locket. Inside is a picture of Lady Hennington!

gilded-egg.prompt: The gilded egg is intriguing but not the end of your search.

options.title: Examine the egg further
options.story: The egg cracks open to reveal a note: 'The trophy's fate lies with the Lady of the Coop.'

secret-hatch.prompt: The secret hatch may hold answers.

options.title: Descend the ladder
options.story: You climb down to discover a hidden chamber, where Lady Hennington sits, practicing her speech with a chicken statue that looks suspiciously like the trophy.

find-key.prompt: The key leads you to a locked diary in Lady Hennington's quarters.

options.title: Unlock the diary
options.story: The diary reveals that Lady Hennington needed the trophy to ensure her speech would be perfect. She never meant for it to go this far.

find-locket.prompt: The locket's contents are a clue to the trophy's whereabouts.

options.title: Confront Lady Hennington
options.story: Lady Hennington gasps upon seeing the locket, 'I must come clean! The trophy was in my possession all along for a speech rehearsal!'

note-from-egg.prompt: The note has set the stage for a revelation.

options.title: Go to Lady Hennington
options.story: You find Lady Hennington with a faux trophy, rehearsing her speech. 'I needed to feel like a winner,' she admits sheepishly.

lady-hennington.prompt: You've found Lady Hennington with the statue.

options.title: Question her
options.story: She confesses, 'I borrowed the trophy for confidence. It was foolish, I know. Let's return it together.'

diary-confession.prompt: The diary has unlocked the truth.

options.title: Bring the diary to the villagers
options.story: The villagers read the diary, and Lady Hennington steps forward, ashamed, ready to make amends for the chaos she caused.

lady-confesses.prompt: Lady Hennington's admission brings the search to an end.

options.title: Retrieve the trophy
options.story: With a sigh of relief, Lady Hennington hands over the trophy, and you assure her that her speech will be great without gimmicks.

lady-rehearsal.prompt: The rehearsal leads to a heartfelt confession.

options.title: Sympathize with Lady Hennington
options.story: You empathize with her need to succeed and gently suggest using her own merit rather than the trophy's luck.

options.title: Announce the good news
options.story: Together with Lady Hennington, you announce the trophy's return at the village gathering, to cheers and relief.

villagers-forgive.prompt: The villagers show understanding and forgiveness.

options.title: Celebrate the resolution
options.story: The air is filled with a sense of unity as the villagers decide to celebrate the trophy's return and Lady Hennington's honesty.

trophy-recovered.prompt: With the trophy recovered, peace is restored.

options.title: Plan a trophy ceremony
options.story: The villagers decide to hold a ceremony to place the trophy back in its rightful spot, with Lady Hennington as the guest of honor.

trophy-returned.prompt: The trophy's return marks a new chapter.

options.title: Begin a new tradition
options.story: Inspired by recent events, the village starts a new tradition where every year, a 'villager of honor' is chosen to hold the trophy for a day.

celebration.prompt: The village rejoices with a grand celebration.

options.title: Join in the festivities
options.story: Music, dance, and a sense of togetherness fill the air as the village celebrates not just the trophy's return, but also the spirit of community.

feast.prompt: A feast is held in the village square.

options.title: Feast with the villagers
options.story: Tables are laden with food as the villagers gather to feast, forgiving Lady Hennington and celebrating the end of the mystery.

ceremony-preparations.prompt: The ceremony preparations bring everyone together.

options.title: Assist with the preparations
options.story: You help set up the stage and decorations, ensuring that the ceremony is a testament to the village's resilience and unity.

new-tradition.prompt: A new tradition fosters community pride.

options.title: Celebrate the first honoree
options.story: Lady Hennington, in a twist of fate, becomes the first honoree, her speech touching every heart in the audience.

end.prompt: The adventure concludes with the village stronger and more united than ever, the trophy shining brightly, symbolizing not just victory, but the heart of the community.
